subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: When the Mets needed their long, stressful season saved for at least one more day Saturday, they relied on Santana. When Santana needed to save that season, he relied on his changeup.
snippet: When the Mets needed their long, stressful season saved for at least one more day Saturday, they relied on Santana. When Santana needed to save that season, he relied on his changeup.
